Description: The Microsoft Office 365 Safe Attachments feature is not enabled. Safe Attachments is a Microsoft feature that uses behavioral analysis and detonation in a virtual environment to add another layer of defense against malware on top of existing Exchange Online anti-malware policies. It is recommended that you enable this feature. This finding may also indicate that you do not have a high enough O365 license to enable ATP features.
Remediation: Safe Attachments can be configured by navigating to the Threat Management portal in the Office 365 Security and Compliance center. The first reference below is a detailed guide to configuring ATP Safe Attachments.

References.Text: Quick Start Guide to Safe Attachments Policies
